info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:57PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM PDT... At 756 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just northeast of Lake Thomas Edison 9 miles south of Mammoth Lakes, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Localized heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Lake Thomas Edison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
